"Donny Don Kirshner would take a kid off the street, bring him up to his office in the Brill Building and turn him into Neil Diamond , Carole King , James Taylor , on and on," Jack Wishna said. I haven't spoken to anyone in the music business that Donny hasn't either discovered, promoted, or touched in some way. "I've never seen anybody like this in my life, he said. Don Kirshner was behind " Don Kirshner 's Rock Concert" in 1972, and gave national exposure to musicians including Billy Joel and The Police.
